item.title: About Us
item.dc:creator: TRX_admin
item.content:encoded: [trx_section bg_tint="light" bg_color="#f4f7f9" class="accent_top" animation="fadeInUp"] [trx_content top="2.5em" bottom="2.5em"] [trx_title type="2" style="regular" align="center" top="0" bottom="0.85em"]Why choose online education?[/trx_title] [trx_columns count="2"] [trx_column_item] [trx_block font_size="1.25em"] [trx_icon icon="icon-pen-2" font_size="3.5em" align="left" bottom="0.15em" right="0.5em" class="link_color"]Study, have fun, uncover a new passion or learn skills that just may change your life. [/trx_block] [trx_block font_size="1.25em" top="0.5em"] [trx_icon icon="icon-new-2" font_size="3.5em" align="left" bottom="0.15em" right="0.5em" class="link_color"]Become an online Education student, it's easy... Take online Education courses at your pace, at home or in a cafe. [/trx_block] [trx_block font_size="1.25em" top="1.5em"] [trx_icon icon="icon-lightbulb-2" font_size="3.5em" align="left" bottom="0.15em" right="0.5em" class="link_color"]From our think tank to your screen—we help you learn through cool tools, videos and game-like labs, like our 3D virtual molecule builder.
